body_html:
Thank you for pointing that out, I will find a suitable solution for my own code in the meantime.
Getting back to my initial suggestion, it still seems that only being able to allocate memory in the device as Tensors to be quite limiting and that a little more control for the programmer could be beneficial in some cases.

body:
Thank you for pointing that out, I will find a suitable solution for my own code in the meantime.
Getting back to my initial suggestion, it still seems that only being able to allocate memory in the device as Tensors to be quite limiting and that a little more control for the programmer could be beneficial in some cases.
